The world would be a better place without this game, but goddamnit, it is addicting. You can play this game for years and still get destroyed by some dude named "Ronald Reagan's Cocaine Cartel" who hits headshots from across the map with a Nova. 

If you like games where improvement is tied to studying and learning the maps and don't mind a touch of toxicity, play this game. There's a reason most who have this game have 1,000+ hours on this.
It was a good game 6 years ago, not much changed since release, just more cheaters, griefers and scammers. Valve, please use your brains to make some changes for players, rather then bottom line!
